ISI.Description: Interval between two-pulse stimuli. Applies only to TWO-PULSE condition

trial_type.Description: Categorical code referring to stimulus condition

Levels.113: PLAID (two superimposed oriented gratings, contrast level 5)
Levels.114: CIRCULAR (eight superimposed oriented gratings, contrast level 5)

trial_name.Description: Description of the stimulus category that was shown during this experiment (see trial_type)

stim_file.Description: Name of the stimulus file that was shown during this trial of the experiment

sample.Description: Stimulus onset in samples relative to the start of the run
